entry.title: Study of the Earth Deep Interior meeting 2018
entry.summary: I'll be at the SEDI meeting 2018 in Edmonton, Canada, in July!
entry.content:
I'll be at the SEDI meeting 2018 in Edmonton, Canada, in July!

I will present my last publication (GrowYourIC) and the last updates to compare seismic observations and geodynamical models for the inner core.

More info on the meeting on their website.

entry.title: New website
entry.summary: This is the first article on my new website!
entry.content:
This is the first article on my new website!

I'll update this webpage to tell you more about my research interests and my academic news.
